## R Markdown

The objective of this presentation is to demonstrate the functionality of the _Plotly_ visualisation tool.

The subject of the plot is from the Tidy Tuesday data analysis 14th January 2020, about "passwords". You can find information on the dataset <here>(https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2020/2020-01-14/readme.md)
